items.sentence: If you learn from the mistakes of others, you don't need to make so many mistakes yourself.
The children sent their letters to the North Pole, hoping that Santa Claus would read them.
Tom couldn't decide whether he wanted to learn to play the violin or the clarinet, or both.
If we don't thoroughly examine the cause of bullying, bullying will probably never go away.
It's almost always better to tell the truth, even though sometimes it's more polite to lie.
